result.markdown:
Yihui technique to emulate very fast touchtyping for presentations


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
xfun::rstudio_type(t, pause = function() truncnorm::rtruncnorm(1, 0, 0.5, .005, .01), mistake = .001)
xfun::rstudio_type(t, pause = function() rbeta(1, 1, 9)/60, mistake = .001)
xfun::rstudio_type(t, pause = function() rbeta(1, 1, 2)/60, mistake = .001)
```
:::
